title: INVESTIGATOR

title: Personal Assistant
description: Personal assistant to Ultra high net worth individual-Interests included: 300 room beach front resort, 31 luxury beach rental homes, 125 luxury rental condos, 7 personal estates, 2 NYC penthouses, 40,000 acre cattle/timber ranch, 22 major retail operations, 700+ rental properties, 750-800 employees. Duties included: On call 24Hrs per day, 7 days per week, (worked 301 days in a row 2003-2004) Global travel ready on 2 hours notice. Managed and directed 9-14 person entourage. Developed all logistics and travel itineraries and personal staff schedules. Developed and managed personal protection detail, including advance team and secure travel, private jet management, yacht, and two and three vehicle convoy. Developed and managed Principal’s personal schedule to the minute, screened all Principal’s communication including handling and screening high-volume of incoming calls with tact and discretion; placed outgoing calls and text messaging; maintained detailed phone call activity logs, all email and faxes. Organized and maintained Principal’s ever changing calendar, contact list and complex schedule of personal matters. Protected and maintained total confidentiality of Principal’s information and activities. Coordinated and executed the transfer of highly-confidential materials. Liaised from Principal to; Legal team, accounting team, banking and finance client advisors and product specialists, publicists, department heads, directors, area managers, estate managers, employees, and personal staff. Served as“Gatekeeper and liaison” for the multitude of daily demands on the Principal’s time from personal staff, employees and teams of various management, business partners, philanthropic inquiries.
name: Jeffrey Mifflin

title: Senior Director, Security Operations
description: Specific Activities: Developed the strategies to implement and maintained business continuity plan in a collaborative manner that supported the business operations. Developed the strategies to implement and maintain wellness plans that addressed health pandemics, chemical/biohazardous situations, terrorist actions and Homeland Security coordination. Developed the strategies and served as security consultant to business unit(s), providing physical security risk management guidance, emergency preparedness and response, security awareness training, security policies and standards. Implemented and oversaw the security strategies and procedures that protect intellectual information, people and physical assets; aligned with the business strategy; supported recovery of business functionality; and positioned the business to meet its operating goals. Interviewed government agencies, intelligence sources, professional agencies and business leaders to cull information, reviewed and analyzed global security trends; disseminated and acted upon security intelligence findings to mitigate known risks. Developed strategies, scope and managed capital projects; represented the organization on internal and external Task Forces/Special Committees as needed. Performed vulnerability risk assessments and readiness audits; and made recommendations for security-related improvements. Maintained effective relationships with government agencies, security professionals and other external resources.
name: Jeffrey Mifflin
